mapper.select: select a.id as "id", a.process_instance_id as "processInstanceId", a.task_id as "taskId", a.task_name as "taskName", DATE_FORMAT(a.op_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "opTime", a.op_user_id as "opUserId", a.op_type as "opType", a.op_comment as "opComment", a.op_data_id as "opDataId", a.proc_def_key as "procDefKey", b.name as "opUserName" from pf_workflow_trace a left join pf_sm_employee b on a.op_user_id=b.account where 1=1 and a.op_data_id=#{bid} and a.proc_def_key =#{procDefKey} and a.op_type not in('启动','结束') order by a.op_time asc,a.task_id DESC
